data.text: @ur_genious @njdotcom The democrats are just hateful bigots. The vax has never been proven to work. I am sorry you are mentally challenged
@Fullstrength @njdotcom It's not voting polls...it's hospitals that are kicking out unvaxed covid patients 🤣🤪
@njdotcom @GovMurphy told us zero cases were the goal. Hmmm
@njdotcom Work around tons of people everyday- never hear/ see ANY of this from anyone.

@njdotcom Thank you for these daily updates. They have been very helpful. I’m sure you don’t hear that enough based on the comments that usually accompany these posts. It’s a shame how these past two years highlighted the even more harmful epidemics of ignorance and lack of civility.
@njdotcom "as states shifts from pandemic to endemic" lol at politicians manufacturing biological reality by fiat
